attributes.review: It took forever to download and crashes all the time.  I get constant spam alerts.   The pictures of Trump must be manipulated by hackers because his hands look so small in all of them.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! First off it took 74 WEEKS to download! It takes up a lot of storage and the app is terrible to navigate, horrible and if I could give it 0 STARS I would!!!!🤬😡😡 two I thought it would change majority of views on Mr trump, wrong

This is horrible! If I could get it a negative one million I would, I am very ashamed of how many ads they have, also it took forever to load and to also download! I don’t suggest downloading this app!
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: This app is so bad I almost kllled myself! At first everything was fine but then all the frickin sudden all my stuff got hacked from Washington apperantly! I had to change all my passwords sell my hamster like what tf???? Don’t download this
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: it took forever to download then my phone started glitching and Obama showed up at my house and lit my phone on fire anyway a bunch of crying oranges came out of nowhere and i HATE this deleting right now
attributes.title: ruined my life 🧚‍♀️✨👁👄👁

attributes.review: At first the app was working fine but then one day I opened the app and MY PHONE EXPLODED and I just new that this app was the reason why that happened so DO NOT BUY unless you want your new iphone to explode and give you 1st degree burns 😩😩😩😩 I’m warning you
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Where do I start. The MOMENT I downloaded this app my dog started yelling at my pet iguana to get a job I tried asking my so called “president” for help but he told me to put the jelly back in the oreo box.... completely INAPPROPRIATE this app has done ABSOLUTELY NOTHING to help the situation 😒🤚🏼
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: If I could give this app zero starts I would. It took forever to download and once it did a bunch of viruses started popping up on my phone. It was just all together a bad app! I am very disappointed!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: Couldn’t understand any dialog and many bugs started to occur while using the app. Poor quality designs along with very unstable  text that glitches.
attributes.title: Really unstable platform 😕

attributes.review: Okay so when I first downloaded this app i was getting strange text messages from middle aged men that are trump supporters, saying that they would like to grab me by the cooch🤯this app is all around just bad!!!!! Take the whole app AWAY!!!!!!
attributes.title: Worst app EVER!!!!!!
